column2: Now that the Pecheneg tribes have been driven out of the region, the Vlach people have become the dominant population in this province
A few of the local Vlachs have risen high enough in society that they consider themselves worthy of a place at your court
The predominant Vlach culture of your capital has been growing on you. You consider adopting their cultural and religious customs
I will embrace the ways of my subjects
Our ways are the best. These Vlachs should adopt my customs instead
